appetizers.description: A crisp green salad with fresh crunchy croutons and rich, creamy caesar dressing.
Shredded chicken sprinkled with cheddar cheese on a tortilla wrap grilled to perfection.

coldSandwiches.description: A hearty ham sandwich with deli chipped ham, crispy lettuce and mayo on freshly baked wheat bread.
A triple decker turkey club, stacked with sliced turkey, lettuce, mayo and bacon on white bread.

hotSandwiches.description: Freshly fried chicken breast with onion and lettuce on a soft bun.
Homemade meatballs topped with marinara sauce and sprinkled mozzarella on freshly baked bread

desserts.description: A rich and decadent chocolate cake with creamy chocolate frosting.
Creamy vanilla ice cream topped with hot fudge and crushed peanuts.

drinks.description: A sweet and sour strawberry lemonade with sliced strawberries, freshly squeezed lemons and liquid sugar.
Refreshing blueberries crushed in filtered tea topped with granulated sugar.
